text: Gregory James Nava is an American movie director. Nava was born on April 10, 1949 in San Diego, California. He won several awards for his movies. ==Filmography== * The Confessions of Amans (1977) * The End of August (1982) * El Norte (1983) * A Time of Destiny (1988) * My Family/Mi Familia (1995) * Selena (1997) * Why Do Fools Fall in Love (1998) * Frida (2002) * Bordertown (2007) ==Other websites== * * Gregory Nava informational web site * Cineaste interview by Dennis West * PBS interview of Gregory Nava with Bill Moyers * San Diego Film Festival honors Gregory Nava Category:American movie directors Category:People from San Diego Category:1949 births Category:Living people
title: Gregory Nava
